tool.name: OTB.SOMClassification
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayin False isArrayvm False output_data_out $output_data_out output_data_som $output_data_som name OTB.SOMClassification in $in out $out vm $vm tp $tp ts $ts som $som sx $sx sy $sy nx $nx ny $ny ni $ni bi $bi bf $bf iv $iv ram $ram rand $rand prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out outputType_som $OutputSection_som.outputType_som transmissionMode_som $OutputSection_som.transmissionMode_som

param.name: in
param.label: Input image to classify.
param.help: Input image to classify. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, jpeg

param.name: out
param.label: Output classified image (each pixel contains the index of its corresponding vector in the SOM).
param.help: Output classified image (each pixel contains the index of its corresponding vector in the SOM).

param.name: vm
param.label: Validity mask (only pixels corresponding to a mask value greater than 0 will be used for learning)
param.help: Validity mask (only pixels corresponding to a mask value greater than 0 will be used for learning) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, jpeg

param.name: tp
param.label: Probability for a sample to be selected in the training set
param.help: Probability for a sample to be selected in the training set

param.name: ts
param.label: Maximum training set size (in pixels)

param.name: som
param.label: Output image containing the Self-Organizing Map
param.help: Output image containing the Self-Organizing Map

param.name: sx
param.label: X size of the SOM map
param.help: X size of the SOM map

param.name: sy
param.label: Y size of the SOM map
param.help: Y size of the SOM map

param.name: nx
param.label: X size of the initial neighborhood in the SOM map
param.help: X size of the initial neighborhood in the SOM map

param.name: ny
param.label: Y size of the initial neighborhood in the SOM map
param.help: Y size of the initial neighborhood in the SOM map

param.name: ni
param.label: Number of iterations for SOM learning
param.help: Number of iterations for SOM learning

param.name: bi
param.label: Initial learning coefficient

param.name: bf
param.label: Final learning coefficient

param.name: iv
param.label: Maximum initial neuron weight

param.name: ram
param.label: Available memory for processing (in MB)

param.name: rand
param.label: Set specific seed. with integer value.
param.help: Set specific seed. with integer value.

param.name: prefer
param.label: Choose the Prefer

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_out
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

param.name: transmissionMode_out
param.label: Choose the transmission mode
